title: Acquisition
content: Cast at the start of your turn, before you move. Take one Object of your choice or one gold from any character.

title: Alchemy
content: Cast at the start of your turn, before you move. Convert any number of Objects you have into gold. Discard the chosen Objects and gain 1 gold for each.

title: Counterspell
content: Cast as required. Negate the effects of any Spell just cast, including the Command Spell.

title: Destroy Magic
content: Cast at the start or end of your turn. No character, including yourself, may cast a Spell or use any Magic Object until the start of your next turn.

title: Destruction
content: Cast at the start of your turn, or when you have just completed your move. Remove any faceup Adventure Card from the board and place it on the discard pile.

title: Divination
content: Cast at the start of your turn, before you move. Take one secret look at the top five cards on the Adventure Deck.

title: Healing
content: Cast as required. By casting it on yourself or any other character the recipient is healed up to his life value.

title: Hex
content: Cast at the start of your turn, before you move. Place this card on any space in the Outer or Middle Region not already occupied by a character. It remains for 3 complete rounds, after which it is placed on the discard pile. Any character landing on the Hex loses a life.

title: Immobility
content: Cast at the start of a character's turn, before he moves. If cast on a character, he is immobilised (may do nothing apart from negating this Spell with Counterspell) for the duration of that turn. If cast on a creature, it cannot be attacked but may be evaded until the end of the turn.

title: Invisibility
content: Cast as required. You may evade any creature or character until the end of this turn.

title: Mesmerism
content: Cast at the start of your turn, before you move. Take one Follower of your choice from any character.

title: Nullify
content: Cast at any time on any character. That character must discard all of his Spells.

title: Preservation
content: Cast as required, on any character, Follower, or Enemy. It prevents a character from losing a life or a Follower from being killed. When cast on an Enemy, it prevents it from being killed, and the attack is considered a stand-off.

title: Psionic Blast
content: Cast on yourself when you are about to engage in battle. Add your Craft value to your Strength until the end of the battle.

title: Random
content:
Cast on any character at any time. He rolls 1 die to determine the effect on him:

1. Become a Toad for 3 turns
2. Lose Strength*
3. Lose Craft*
4. Lose all gold
5. Gain 1 Strength
6. Gain 1 life

* All but Strength and Craft values and those gained from Followers and Objects.

title: Teleport
content: Cast on yourself instead of rolling the die for movement. Teleport to any other space in the same Region. This Spell cannot be cast in the Inner Region.

title: Temporal Warp
content: Cast at the start of your turn, before you move. You may take three successive turns instead of one before play passes to the next player.
